title: 1965년 McClenny 사건
summary: 미국 Colorado, CO 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: McClenny. 판결일: 1965-03-15. 법원: Supreme Court of Colorado.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Billy E. McClenny v. The People of the State of Colorado
**판결일**: 1965-03-15
**법원**: Supreme Court of Colorado
**관할**: Colorado, CO

**판사**: Pringle

## 변호인

V. G. Seavy, Jr., for plaintiff in error., Duke W. Dunbar, Attorney General, Frank E. Hickey, Deputy, Richard L. Eason, Assistant, for defendant in error.

## 인용

- 156 Colo. 468
- 402 P.2d 615

## 판결문 요약


Opinion by
Mr. Chief Justice Pringle.
The plaintiff in error was jointly charged, with one Vernon C. Reed, with burglary and conspiracy to commit burglary. Reed and McClenny were tried together and convicted, Reed being sentenced to a term in the State Reformatory and McClenny to a term in the State Peni*469tentiary. McClenny seeks review of the judgment against him by separate writ of error from that sought by Reed, but a joint brief has been filed here in behalf of both.
The assignments of error here are the same as those raised in Reed v. The People, 156 Colo. 450, 402 P.2d 68, decided this day, opinion by Mr. Justice McWilliams.
Upon the basis of the decision in that case and the opinion therein written, the judgment in this case is affirmed.
Mr. Justice Day and Mr. Justice McWilliams concur.
...
